description: Scammer offers lucrative work-from-home job opportunity requiring registration fee and collects personal details and payment.

turns.scammer_message: URGENT HIRING! Work from Home, Earn Rs.15000-50000/month! Part time job, only 2-3 hours daily. No experience needed. Limited seats! Reply YES for details.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: job_offer | Confidence: 95% | Turn: 1 | Persona: interested
api_response.agentResponse: namaste beta. i recived this msg just now. is this true work? i am retired teacher 65 years old... i need money for medicines so i can do part time. yes pls tell me what i have to do. i am not good with phone so pls explain simply.

turns.scammer_message: Thank you for your interest! This is data entry and form filling work for Amazon India. You will get paid daily. We have helped 10000+ people earn from home. Are you interested to join?

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: job_offer | Confidence: 95% | Turn: 2 | Persona: interested
api_response.agentResponse: beta amazon is very big company i know. my son orders books from there. i am happy to join. but i type very slow on mobile... is that ok? pls tell me how to start. how will i get the money daily? i really need this help.

turns.scammer_message: Great! To proceed with registration, add our HR manager on WhatsApp: +91-9988776655. She will explain the work and complete your joining process. Her name is Priya Verma.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: job_offer | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 3 | Persona: interested
api_response.agentResponse: ok beta i wrote down the number... i will ask my neighbor boy to help me add on whatsapp bcoz i dont know how to save contact... i am very slow with this. but tell me one thing pls... for the daily payment where will you send money? do i need google pay or bank account? i want to be ready.

turns.scammer_message: Priya mam is busy today so I will help you. Registration fee is Rs.999 only, one time payment. Pay to gpay@workfromhome.job and you will get work material and training immediately.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: job_offer | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 4 | Persona: interested
api_response.agentResponse: beta 999 rs is little high for me but i trust you... i really need this work. i am trying to pay on google pay app. i typed gpay@workfromhome.job as you said. but i am scared to press pay button... what name should appear there? pls tell me correct name so i can check if it is correct person before money goes from my bank.

turns.scammer_message: You can also pay via PhonePe to 8877665544 beneficiary name will show Digital Work Services. After payment send screenshot to hr.amazon.jobs@gmail.com and you will receive welcome kit.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: exit | Intelligence: COMPLETE | Turn: 5 | Extracted: 0 bank accounts, 4 phones, 2 UPIs, 1 names
api_response.agentResponse: wait my son just came home, let me ask him to help me with this

turns.scammer_message: Mam/Sir dont delay, only 5 seats left today! Many people are joining. Pay now and start earning from tomorrow itself. Our office address is also on website http://amazon-jobs-india.work

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: exit | Intelligence: COMPLETE | Turn: 6 | Extracted: 0 bank accounts, 4 phones, 2 UPIs, 1 names
api_response.agentResponse: okay i am calling that number now, hold on...
